title: Watch Premier League Tottenham vs. Liverpool Today Free: Time, Stream & Channel
description: Curious about when and how to watch the Tottenham vs. Liverpool match this weekend? We have all the details right here. As 2024 draws to a conclusion, Premier League teams battle against one another to secure the best possible position in the table before the following year’s arrival. One such club is Tottenham, who will […] The post Watch Premier League Tottenham vs. Liverpool Today Free: Time, Stream & Channel appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Apoorv Rastogi
excerpt: Wondering when and how to watch the Tottenham vs. Liverpool match this weekend? We have all the details right here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Curious about when and how to watch the Tottenham vs. Liverpool match this weekend? We have all the details right here. As 2024 draws to a conclusion, Premier League teams battle against one another to secure the best possible position in the table before the following year’s arrival. One such club is Tottenham, who will face the daunting task of taking down a flying Liverpool side today. Find out how to watch the Tottenham vs. Liverpool game live below. Where can you watch the Tottenham vs. Liverpool game today? You can watch Tottenham vs. Liverpool today via USA Network, FuboTV, and SlingTV. Fans in the UK can also watch the game live via Sky Sports, NowTV, and SkyGo app. With NBC broadcasting a hoard of Premier League matches in the US, a big chunk of those games are televised on USA Network, including today’s match. On the streaming front, fans can watch the game on FuboTV and SlingTV. Meanwhile, interested viewers in the UK can enjoy today’s bout on Sky Sports, with Sky Go and NowTV serving as the streaming options. What time does the match start? Tottenham vs. Liverpool takes place at 11:30 AM ET, 8:30 AM PT, and 4:30 PM BST on December 22. Liverpool are arguably the most in-form team in Europe at the moment. Not only have the Reds maintained a flawless record in the Champions League this term, but they also sit at the summit of the Premier League. Meanwhile, Tottenham have struggled to capitalize on their promising performances, often giving away matches from winning positions. As such, they currently sit in 10th place in the league despite having an impressive goal difference of 17. How to watch & stream Tottenham vs. Liverpool for free? You can watch Tottenham vs. Liverpool for free via FuboTV and NowTV. FuboTV and NowTV allow new US and UK users to access their content for free by providing a 7-day free trial. After the expiry of these introductory periods, members are required to fork up standard subscription prices. Predictions Tottenham recently shocked everyone by knocking out a resurgent Manchester United team from the EFL Cup. Nevertheless, as per usual Spurs standards, the North London side almost blew away their 3-0 lead, eventually running out 4-3 victors. It would be tough for Ange Postecoglu’s men to pull off a similar miracle against the dominant Liverpool. While Tottenham are expected to notch a goal or two, Liverpool should be able to walk away with a comfortable win.
html:
Curious about when and how to watch the Tottenham vs. Liverpool match this weekend? We have all the details right here. As 2024 draws to a conclusion, Premier League teams battle against one another to secure the best possible position in the table before the following year’s arrival. One such club is Tottenham, who will face the daunting task of taking down a flying Liverpool side today.

Find out how to watch the Tottenham vs. Liverpool game live below.

Where can you watch the Tottenham vs. Liverpool game today?

You can watch Tottenham vs. Liverpool today via USA Network, FuboTV, and SlingTV. Fans in the UK can also watch the game live via Sky Sports, NowTV, and SkyGo app.

With NBC broadcasting a hoard of Premier League matches in the US, a big chunk of those games are televised on USA Network, including today’s match. On the streaming front, fans can watch the game on FuboTV and SlingTV. Meanwhile, interested viewers in the UK can enjoy today’s bout on Sky Sports, with Sky Go and NowTV serving as the streaming options.

What time does the match start?

Tottenham vs. Liverpool takes place at 11:30 AM ET, 8:30 AM PT, and 4:30 PM BST on December 22.

Liverpool are arguably the most in-form team in Europe at the moment. Not only have the Reds maintained a flawless record in the Champions League this term, but they also sit at the summit of the Premier League. Meanwhile, Tottenham have struggled to capitalize on their promising performances, often giving away matches from winning positions. As such, they currently sit in 10th place in the league despite having an impressive goal difference of 17.

How to watch & stream Tottenham vs. Liverpool for free?

You can watch Tottenham vs. Liverpool for free via FuboTV and NowTV.

FuboTV and NowTV allow new US and UK users to access their content for free by providing a 7-day free trial. After the expiry of these introductory periods, members are required to fork up standard subscription prices.

Predictions

Tottenham recently shocked everyone by knocking out a resurgent Manchester United team from the EFL Cup. Nevertheless, as per usual Spurs standards, the North London side almost blew away their 3-0 lead, eventually running out 4-3 victors. It would be tough for Ange Postecoglu’s men to pull off a similar miracle against the dominant Liverpool. While Tottenham are expected to notch a goal or two, Liverpool should be able to walk away with a comfortable win.
